author: BaoZakeruga

text:
@BaoZakeruga


I have Extreme-G3, and it's one of my favorite racing games.  It's futuristic, it has cool music, and it is EXTREMELY fast-paced.  Stuff moves so fast on the screen that it gives my friend motion sickness.  I've never played G1 or G2 but I would imagine they are probably similar.

author: ElNacho

text: This was my futuristic racing game of choice back then, I loved it. The fast racing part alone was entertaining, but the addition of weapons made it even more fun. The trance soundtrack was memorable as well, with G-Storm being arguably the game's main and most popular theme.
